song.title: Forbidden Colours 2.1
song.info: Forbiddencolours2.1 1996 by -> Gavin Lucas <- V 2.1 of the rmx. original: "Merry Christmas Mr.Lawrence" by R.Sakamoto also used in the C 64 game "Last Ninja Remix" for wich R.Ouwehand did the music E-mail to: glucas@hib.de For MOD & CD Version just send me a mail... bye...
